summary.span: 提供 類別的 HTTP 特定實作。

span.span: Provides an HTTP-specific implementation of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會提供支援的屬性和方法定義在以及其他屬性和方法，讓使用者直接與使用 HTTP 伺服器互動。The class provides support for the properties and methods defined in and for additional properties and methods that enable the user to interact directly with servers using HTTP. 請勿使用建構函式。Do not use the constructor. 使用方法來初始化新物件。Use the method to initialize new objects. 配置的統一資源識別元 (URI) 是否`http://`或是`https://`，傳回物件。If the scheme for the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) is `http://` or `https://`, returns an object. 方法中指定的資源提出同步要求屬性，並傳回，包含回應物件。The method makes a synchronous request to the resource specified in the property and returns an that contains the response object. 可接收回應資料，請使用所傳回的資料流。The response data can be received by using the stream returned by . 如果回應物件或回應資料流已關閉，剩餘的資料即告作廢。If the response object or the response stream is closed, remaining data will be forfeited. 將會清空剩餘的資料和通訊端時，會重複使用的後續要求關閉回應物件或資料流，如果下列條件： keep-alive 或管線的要求，只有少量的資料需要被接收，或小型時間間隔內接收到剩餘的資料。The remaining data will be drained and the socket will be re-used for subsequent requests when closing the response object or stream if the following conditions hold: it's a keep-alive or pipelined request, only a small amount of data needs to be received, or the remaining data is received in a small time interval. 如果上述條件保存或超過清空時間，將會關閉通訊端。If none of the mentioned conditions hold or the drain time is exceeded, the socket will be closed. 如為 keep-alive 或以管線連接時，我們強烈建議應用程式讀取資料流，直到 EOF 為止。For keep-alive or pipelined connections, we strongly recommend that the application reads the streams until EOF. 這可確保通訊端，將會產生較佳的效能，並降低使用資源的後續要求重複使用。This ensures that the socket will be re-used for subsequent requests resulting in better performance and less resources used. 當您想要將資料傳送至資源，方法會傳回物件，用來傳送資料。When you want to send data to the resource, the method returns a object to use to send data. 和方法提供傳送資料流的非同步存取。The and methods provide asynchronous access to the send data stream. 對於使用用戶端驗證，用戶端憑證必須安裝在我的憑證存放區目前的使用者。For client authentication with , the client certificate must be installed in the My certificate store of the current user. 類別會擲回何時存取資源時沒有發生錯誤。The class throws a when errors occur while accessing a resource. 屬性包含值，指出錯誤的來源。The property contains a value that indicates the source of the error. 當已，則屬性包含接收自資源。When is , the property contains the received from the resource. 會公開一般 HTTP 標頭值傳送至網際網路資源，為屬性，設定方法，或是由系統; 所設定下表包含完整的清單。 exposes common HTTP header values sent to the Internet resource as properties, set by methods, or set by the system; the following table contains a complete list. 您可以設定其他標頭屬性當做名稱/值組。You can set other headers in the property as name/value pairs. 請注意，伺服器和快取可能會變更或在要求期間新增標頭。Note that servers and caches may change or add headers during the request. 下表列出由屬性或方法或系統設定 HTTP 標頭。The following table lists the HTTP headers that are set either by properties or methods or the system. |頁首Header|設定Set by| |------------|------------| |接受Accept|設定屬性。Set by the property.| |連線Connection|藉由設定屬性，屬性。Set by the property, property.| |內容長度Content-Length|設定屬性。Set by the property.| |Content-TypeContent-Type|設定屬性。Set by the property.| |預期Expect|設定屬性。Set by the property.| |日期Date|設定由系統目前的日期。Set by the system to current date.| |主機Host|由系統目前的主機資訊設定。Set by the system to current host information.| |如果修改自If-Modified-Since|設定屬性。Set by the property.| |範圍Range|設定方法。Set by the method.| |推薦者Referer|設定屬性。Set by the property.| |傳輸編碼方式Transfer-Encoding|藉由設定屬性 (屬性必須是`true`)。Set by the property (the property must be `true`).| |使用者代理程式User-Agent|設定屬性。Set by the property.| > [!NOTE] > 會自動註冊。 is registered automatically. 您不需要呼叫方法，以註冊之前使用 Uri 開頭`http://`或`https://`。You do not need to call the method to register before using URIs beginning with `http://` or `https://`. 在本機電腦或應用程式組態檔，可能會指定使用預設 proxy。The local computer or application config file may specify that a default proxy be used. 如果指定屬性，然後從的 proxy 設定屬性會覆寫本機電腦或應用程式組態檔和執行個體將會使用指定的 proxy 設定。If the property is specified, then the proxy settings from the property override the local computer or application config file and the instance will use the proxy settings specified. 如果未不指定任何 proxy 在組態檔中，屬性未指定，類別會使用繼承自 Internet Explorer 中，在本機電腦上的 proxy 設定。If no proxy is specified in a config file and the property is unspecified, the class uses the proxy settings inherited from Internet Explorer on the local computer. 如果沒有在 Internet Explorer proxy 設定，要求會直接傳送到伺服器。If there are no proxy settings in Internet Explorer, the request is sent directly to the server. 類別可剖析 proxy 略過清單包含繼承自 Internet Explorer 以不同的方式略過清單由 Internet Explorer 直接剖析非萬用字元。The class parses a proxy bypass list with wildcard characters inherited from Internet Explorer differently than the bypass list is parsed directly by Internet Explorer. 比方說，類別將會剖析"nt \*"從 Internet Explorer 略過清單做為規則運算式的 「 nt。 $"。For example, the class will parse a bypass list of "nt\*" from Internet Explorer as a regular expression of "nt.$". 這不同於 Internet Explorer 的原生行為。This differs from the native behavior of Internet Explorer. 因此的 URL 」`http://intxxxxx`」 會略過 proxy 使用類別，但不是會略過使用 Internet Explorer 的 proxy。So a URL of "`http://intxxxxx`" would bypass the proxy using the class, but would not bypass the proxy using Internet Explorer. > [!NOTE] > 架構在建立快取的 SSL 工作階段，並嘗試盡可能重複使用快取的工作階段，對新的要求。The Framework caches SSL sessions as they are created and attempts to reuse a cached session for a new request, if possible. 嘗試將重複使用的 SSL 工作階段時，架構會使用第一個項目（如果有一個），或嘗試重複使用匿名的工作階段，如果是空的。When attempting to reuse an SSL session, the Framework uses the first element of (if there is one), or tries to reuse an anonymous sessions if is empty. > [!NOTE] > 基於安全性理由，預設會停用 cookie。For security reasons, cookies are disabled by default. 如果您想要使用 cookie，使用屬性，來啟用 cookie。If you want to use cookies, use the property to enable cookies. .NET Framework 4.6 包含會封鎖不安全的加密和雜湊演算法進行連線的新安全性功能。The .NET Framework 4.6 includes a new security feature that blocks insecure cipher and hashing algorithms for connections. 使用 TLS/SSL 透過例如 HttpClient、 HttpWebRequest、 FTPClient、 SmtpClient、 SslStream 」 等的 Api 和以.NET Framework 4.6 為目標的應用程式預設會取得更安全的行為。Applications using TLS/SSL through APIs such as HttpClient, HttpWebRequest, FTPClient, SmtpClient, SslStream, etc. and targeting .NET Framework 4.6 get the more-secure behavior by default. 開發人員可能想要退出此行為，以維護與 RC4 服務具有其現有 SSL3 服務或 TLS 的互通性。Developers may want to opt out of this behavior in order to maintain interoperability with their existing SSL3 services OR TLS w/ RC4 services. [這篇文章](https://support.microsoft.com/kb/3069494)說明如何修改您的程式碼，讓新的行為會停用。[This article](https://support.microsoft.com/kb/3069494) explains how to modify your code so that the new behavior is disabled. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立uri http://www.contoso.com/。The following code example creates an for the URI http://www.contoso.com/. [!code-cpp[Classic HttpWebRequest Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpWebRequest Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic HttpWebRequest Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpWebRequest Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpWebRequest Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpWebRequest Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取消對網際網路資源的要求。

span.span: Cancels a request to an Internet resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法取消資源的要求。The method cancels a request to a resource. 取消要求之後，呼叫， ， ， ， ，或方法會使具有屬性設為。After a request is canceled, calling the , , , , , or method causes a with the property set to . 方法會以同步方式執行指定的回呼或是方法如果任一這些作業未完成時，會呼叫方法。The method will synchronously execute the callback specified to the or methods if the method is called while either of these operations are outstanding. 這可能會導致潛在的死結問題。This can lead to potential deadlock issues. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 網路追蹤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e993b7c3-087f-45d8-9c02-9dded936d804)。For more information, see [Network Tracing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e993b7c3-087f-45d8-9c02-9dded936d804). ## Examples 如果是非同步的要求，它負責用戶端應用程式，來實作其本身的逾時機制。In the case of asynchronous requests, it is the responsibility of the client application to implement its own time-out mechanism. 下列程式碼範例示範如何執行這項操作。The following code example shows how to do this. [!code-cpp[System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse/CPP/begingetresponse.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse/CS/begingetresponse.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.HttpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse/VB/begingetresponse.vb#1)]

summary.span: 將範圍標頭加入至要求。

span.span: Adds a range header to the request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為所有的 HTTP 實體以位元組序列的 HTTP 訊息中，位元組範圍的概念是有意義的任何 HTTP 實體。Since all HTTP entities are represented in HTTP messages as sequences of bytes, the concept of a byte range is meaningful for any HTTP entity. 不過，並非所有的用戶端和伺服器必須支援位元組範圍作業。However, not all clients and servers need to support byte-range operations. 要求的範圍標頭可讓用戶端要求，它只想要接收指定的位元組範圍的某個部分 HTTP 實體中。The Range header on a request allows a client to request that it only wants to receive some part of the specified range of bytes in an HTTP entity. 伺服器不需要支援範圍標頭的要求。Servers are not required to support Range header requests.

summary.span: 針對從已要求資料的起始或結尾的特定範圍，將位元組範圍標頭加入至要求。

span.span: Adds a byte range header to a request for a specific range from the beginning or end of the requested data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會將位元組範圍標頭加入要求。The method adds a byte range header to the request. 如果`range`為正數，`range`參數指定範圍的起點。If `range` is positive, the `range` parameter specifies the starting point of the range. 伺服器應開始傳送資料，從`range`HTTP 實體中的資料結尾指定的參數。The server should start sending data from the `range` parameter specified to the end of the data in the HTTP entity. 如果`range`是負數，`range`參數指定範圍的結束點。If `range` is negative, the `range` parameter specifies the ending point of the range. 伺服器應開始傳送資料，從 HTTP 實體中的資料開始`range`指定的參數。The server should start sending data from the start of the data in the HTTP entity to the `range` parameter specified. 因為所有的 HTTP 實體以位元組序列的 HTTP 訊息中，位元組範圍的概念是有意義的任何 HTTP 實體。Since all HTTP entities are represented in HTTP messages as sequences of bytes, the concept of a byte range is meaningful for any HTTP entity. 不過，並非所有的用戶端和伺服器必須支援位元組範圍作業。However, not all clients and servers need to support byte-range operations. 要求的範圍標頭可讓用戶端要求，它只想要接收指定的位元組範圍的某個部分 HTTP 實體中。The Range header on a request allows a client to request that it only wants to receive some part of the specified range of bytes in an HTTP entity. 伺服器不需要支援範圍標頭的要求。Servers are not required to support Range header requests. 範圍標頭在 HTTP 通訊協定要求，要求伺服器傳送的前 100 個位元組，（從開始到 99 的位元組位置中） 會是如下所示的範例：An example of a Range header in an HTTP protocol request that requests the server send the first 100 bytes (from the start to byte position 99) would be the following: `Range: bytes=0-99\r\n\r\n` 此範例中，針對`range`參數便是-99。For this example, the `range` parameter would be -99. HTTP 伺服器指出範圍包含 Accept-ranges 標頭的標頭的支援。A HTTP server indicates support for Range headers with the Accept-Ranges header. 支援位元組範圍的伺服器的 Accept-ranges 標頭的範例應如下所示：An example of the Accept-Ranges header from a server that supports byte-ranges would be as follows: `Accept-Ranges: bytes\r\n\r\n` Accept-ranges 標頭未收到來自伺服器回應的標頭中，如果伺服器不支援範圍標頭。If an Accept-Ranges header is not received in the header of the response from the server, then the server does not support Range headers. 不支援範圍，但可辨識的 Accept-ranges 標頭中，伺服器的 Accept-ranges 標頭的範例應如下所示：An example of the Accept-Ranges header from a server that does not support ranges, but recognizes the Accept-Ranges header, would be as follows: `Accept-Ranges: none\r\n\r\n` 只有 HTTP 標頭與整個要求相關聯時從範圍要求收到回應時，不會剖析與可透過屬性類別。When receiving the response from a range request, only the HTTP headers associated with the entire request are parsed and made available via properties on the class. 在回應中傳回的每個範圍相關聯的標頭。Headers associated with each range are returned in the response. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將範圍標頭加入至要求。The following code example adds a range header to the request. [!code-cpp[System.Net.HttpWebRequest.AddRange#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.net.httpwebrequest.addrange/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.HttpWebRequest.AddRange#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.net.httpwebrequest.addrange/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Net.HttpWebRequest.AddRange#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.net.httpwebrequest.addrange/vb/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Adds a byte range header to a request for a specific range from the beginning or end of the requested data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會將位元組範圍標頭加入要求。The method adds a byte range header to the request. 如果`range`為正數，`range`參數指定範圍的起點。If `range` is positive, the `range` parameter specifies the starting point of the range. 伺服器應開始傳送資料，從`range`HTTP 實體中的資料結尾指定的參數。The server should start sending data from the `range` parameter specified to the end of the data in the HTTP entity. 如果`range`是負數，`range`參數指定範圍的結束點。If `range` is negative, the `range` parameter specifies the ending point of the range. 伺服器應開始傳送資料，從 HTTP 實體中的資料開始`range`指定的參數。The server should start sending data from the start of the data in the HTTP entity to the `range` parameter specified. 因為所有的 HTTP 實體以位元組序列的 HTTP 訊息中，位元組範圍的概念是有意義的任何 HTTP 實體。Since all HTTP entities are represented in HTTP messages as sequences of bytes, the concept of a byte range is meaningful for any HTTP entity. 不過，並非所有的用戶端和伺服器必須支援位元組範圍作業。However, not all clients and servers need to support byte-range operations. 要求的範圍標頭可讓用戶端要求，它只想要接收指定的位元組範圍的某個部分 HTTP 實體中。The Range header on a request allows a client to request that it only wants to receive some part of the specified range of bytes in an HTTP entity. 伺服器不需要支援範圍標頭的要求。Servers are not required to support Range header requests. 範圍標頭在 HTTP 通訊協定要求，要求伺服器傳送的前 100 個位元組，（從開始到 99 的位元組位置中） 會是如下所示的範例：An example of a Range header in an HTTP protocol request that requests the server send the first 100 bytes (from the start to byte position 99) would be the following: `Range: bytes=0-99\r\n\r\n` 此範例中，針對`range`參數便是-99。For this example, the `range` parameter would be -99. HTTP 伺服器指出範圍包含 Accept-ranges 標頭的標頭的支援。A HTTP server indicates support for Range headers with the Accept-Ranges header. 支援位元組範圍的伺服器的 Accept-ranges 標頭的範例應如下所示：An example of the Accept-Ranges header from a server that supports byte-ranges would be as follows: `Accept-Ranges: bytes\r\n\r\n` Accept-ranges 標頭未收到來自伺服器回應的標頭中，如果伺服器不支援範圍標頭。If an Accept-Ranges header is not received in the header of the response from the server, then the server does not support Range headers. 不支援範圍，但可辨識的 Accept-ranges 標頭中，伺服器的 Accept-ranges 標頭的範例應如下所示：An example of the Accept-Ranges header from a server that does not support ranges, but recognizes the Accept-Ranges header, would be as follows: `Accept-Ranges: none\r\n\r\n` 只有 HTTP 標頭與整個要求相關聯時從範圍要求收到回應時，不會剖析與可透過屬性類別。When receiving the response from a range request, only the HTTP headers associated with the entire request are parsed and made available via properties on the class. 在回應中傳回的每個範圍相關聯的標頭。Headers associated with each range are returned in the response.

span.span: is invalid.
The range header could not be added.

span.span: Adds a byte range header to the request for a specified range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會將位元組範圍標頭加入要求。The method adds a byte range header to the request. 因為所有的 HTTP 實體以位元組序列的 HTTP 訊息中，位元組範圍的概念是有意義的任何 HTTP 實體。Since all HTTP entities are represented in HTTP messages as sequences of bytes, the concept of a byte range is meaningful for any HTTP entity. 不過，並非所有的用戶端和伺服器必須支援位元組範圍作業。However, not all clients and servers need to support byte-range operations. 要求的範圍標頭可讓用戶端要求，它只想要接收指定的位元組範圍的某個部分 HTTP 實體中。The Range header on a request allows a client to request that it only wants to receive some part of the specified range of bytes in an HTTP entity. 伺服器不需要支援範圍標頭的要求。Servers are not required to support Range header requests. 下列是要求前 100 個位元組會透過 HTTP 通訊協定要求的範圍標頭的範例：An example of a Range header in an HTTP protocol request that requests the first 100 bytes would be would be the following: `Range: bytes=0-99\r\n\r\n` 此範例中，如`from`參數會指定為 0 和`to`參數會指定為 99。For this example, the `from` parameter would be specified as 0 and the `to` parameter would be specified as 99. 這個方法，會自動範圍規範設定為 「 位元組 」。The range specifier is automatically set as "bytes" by this method. HTTP 伺服器指出範圍包含 Accept-ranges 標頭的標頭的支援。A HTTP server indicates support for Range headers with the Accept-Ranges header. 支援位元組範圍的伺服器的 Accept-ranges 標頭的範例應如下所示：An example of the Accept-Ranges header from a server that supports byte-ranges would be as follows: `Accept-Ranges: bytes\r\n\r\n` Accept-ranges 標頭未收到來自伺服器回應的標頭中，如果伺服器不支援範圍標頭。If an Accept-Ranges header is not received in the header of the response from the server, then the server does not support Range headers. 不支援範圍，但可辨識的 Accept-ranges 標頭中，伺服器的 Accept-ranges 標頭的範例應如下所示：An example of the Accept-Ranges header from a server that does not support ranges, but recognizes the Accept-Ranges header, would be as follows: `Accept-Ranges: none\r\n\r\n` 只有 HTTP 標頭與整個要求相關聯時從範圍要求收到回應時，不會剖析與可透過屬性類別。When receiving the response from a range request, only the HTTP headers associated with the entire request are parsed and made available via properties on the class. 在回應中傳回的每個範圍相關聯的標頭。Headers associated with each range are returned in the response. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將範圍標頭加入至要求。The following code example adds a range header to the request. [!code-cpp[System.Net.HttpWebRequest.AddRange2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.net.httpwebrequest.addrange2/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.HttpWebRequest.AddRange2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.net.httpwebrequest.addrange2/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Net.HttpWebRequest.AddRange2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.net.httpwebrequest.addrange2/vb/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Adds a range header to a request for a specified range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會將範圍標頭加入要求。The method adds a Range header to the request. 因為所有的 HTTP 實體以位元組序列的 HTTP 訊息中，位元組範圍的概念是有意義的任何 HTTP 實體。Since all HTTP entities are represented in HTTP messages as sequences of bytes, the concept of a byte range is meaningful for any HTTP entity. 不過，並非所有的用戶端和伺服器必須支援位元組範圍作業。However, not all clients and servers need to support byte-range operations. 要求的範圍標頭可讓用戶端要求，它只想要接收指定的位元組範圍的某個部分 HTTP 實體中。The Range header on a request allows a client to request that it only wants to receive some part of the specified range of bytes in an HTTP entity. 伺服器不需要支援範圍標頭的要求。Servers are not required to support Range header requests. `rangeSpecifier`參數通常會指定為"bytes"，因為這是唯一可辨識大部分的 HTTP 伺服器的範圍規範。The `rangeSpecifier` parameter would normally be specified as a "bytes", since this is the only range specifier recognized by most HTTP servers. 設定`rangeSpecifier`某些其他字串的參數允許位元組 （由 IETF RFC 2616 中所定義的位元組範圍規範） 以外的自訂範圍指定名稱的支援。Setting the `rangeSpecifier` parameter to some other string allows support for custom range specifiers other than bytes (the byte-range specifier defined in RFC 2616 by the IETF). 下列是要求前 100 個位元組會透過 HTTP 通訊協定要求的範圍標頭的範例：An example of a Range header in an HTTP protocol request that requests the first 100 bytes would be would be the following: `Range: bytes=0-99\r\n\r\n` 針對此範例中，`rangeSpecifier`參數會指定為 「 位元組 」`from`參數便是 0，而`to`參數會是 99。For this example, the `rangeSpecifier` parameter would be specified as a "bytes", the `from` parameter would be 0, and the `to` parameter would be 99. HTTP 伺服器指出 Accept-ranges 標頭回應中的範圍標頭的支援。A HTTP server indicates support for Range headers with the Accept-Ranges header in the response. 支援位元組範圍的伺服器的 Accept-ranges 標頭的範例應如下所示：An example of the Accept-Ranges header from a server that supports byte-ranges would be as follows: `Accept-Ranges: bytes\r\n\r\n` Accept-ranges 標頭中指定的字串是藉由指定的範圍規範`rangeSpecifier`這個方法的參數。The string specified in the Accept-Ranges header is the range-specifier that would be by specified in the `rangeSpecifier` parameter for this method. Accept-ranges 標頭未收到來自伺服器回應的標頭中，如果伺服器不支援範圍標頭。If an Accept-Ranges header is not received in the header of the response from the server, then the server does not support Range headers. 不支援範圍，但可辨識的 Accept-ranges 標頭中，伺服器的 Accept-ranges 標頭的範例應如下所示：An example of the Accept-Ranges header from a server that does not support ranges, but recognizes the Accept-Ranges header, would be as follows: `Accept-Ranges: none\r\n\r\n` 只有 HTTP 標頭與整個要求相關聯時從範圍要求收到回應時，不會剖析與可透過屬性類別。When receiving the response from a range request, only the HTTP headers associated with the entire request are parsed and made available via properties on the class. 在回應中傳回的每個範圍相關聯的標頭。Headers associated with each range are returned in the response.

HTTP 伺服器指出 Accept-ranges 標頭回應中的範圍標頭的支援。A HTTP server indicates support for Range headers with the Accept-Ranges header in the response. 支援位元組範圍的伺服器的 Accept-ranges 標頭的範例應如下所示：An example of the Accept-Ranges header from a server that supports byte-ranges would be as follows: `Accept-Ranges: bytes\r\n\r\n` Accept-ranges 標頭中指定的字串是藉由指定的範圍規範`rangeSpecifier`這個方法的參數。The string specified in the Accept-Ranges header is the range-specifier that would be by specified in the `rangeSpecifier` parameter for this method. Accept-ranges 標頭未收到來自伺服器回應的標頭中，如果伺服器不支援範圍標頭。If an Accept-Ranges header is not received in the header of the response from the server, then the server does not support Range headers. 不支援範圍，但可辨識的 Accept-ranges 標頭中，伺服器的 Accept-ranges 標頭的範例應如下所示：An example of the Accept-Ranges header from a server that does not support ranges, but recognizes the Accept-Ranges header, would be as follows: `Accept-Ranges: none\r\n\r\n` 只有 HTTP 標頭與整個要求相關聯時從範圍要求收到回應時，不會剖析與可透過屬性類別。When receiving the response from a range request, only the HTTP headers associated with the entire request are parsed and made available via properties on the class. 在回應中傳回的每個範圍相關聯的標頭。Headers associated with each range are returned in the response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定至`true`如果您想要的要求會自動遵循 HTTP 重新導向標頭之資源的新位置。Set to `true` if you want the request to automatically follow HTTP redirection headers to the new location of the resource. 若要遵循重新導向的最大數目由設定屬性。The maximum number of redirections to follow is set by the property. 如果設為`false`，所有回應 HTTP 狀態碼從 300 399 會傳都回到應用程式。If is set to `false`, all responses with an HTTP status code from 300 to 399 is returned to the application. 授權標頭都會自動重新導向和會自動嘗試重新驗證，才能重新導向的位置。The Authorization header is cleared on auto-redirects and automatically tries to re-authenticate to the redirected location. 在實務上，這表示如果它是可能發生重新導向應用程式無法將授權標頭自訂驗證資訊。In practice, this means that an application can't put custom authentication information into the Authorization header if it is possible to encounter redirection. 相反地，應用程式必須實作並註冊自訂驗證模組。Instead, the application must implement and register a custom authentication module. 和相關的類別用來實作自訂驗證模組。The and related class are used to implement a custom authentication module. 方法註冊的自訂驗證模組。The method registers a custom authentication module. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用屬性，以允許進行重新導向回應要求。The following code example uses the property to allow the request to follow redirection responses. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會啟動用來將資料傳送資料流的非同步要求。The method starts an asynchronous request for a stream used to send data for the . 非同步回呼方法會使用方法，以傳回實際的資料流。The asynchronous callback method uses the method to return the actual stream. 方法需要進行一些同步安裝程式工作，這個方法才會非同步完成 （DNS 解析、 proxy 偵測和 TCP 通訊端連線，例如）。The method requires some synchronous setup tasks to complete (DNS resolution, proxy detection, and TCP socket connection, for example) before this method becomes asynchronous. 如此一來，這個方法永遠不可叫用使用者介面 (UI) 執行緒上因為可能需要相當長的時間 （最多幾分鐘，視網路設定而定） 才能完成初始同步設定的例外狀況之前的錯誤會擲回或此方法成功。As a result, this method should never be called on a user interface (UI) thread because it might take considerable time (up to several minutes depending on network settings) to complete the initial synchronous setup tasks before an exception for an error is thrown or the method succeeds. 若要深入了解執行緒集區，請參閱[的 Managed 執行緒集區](~/docs/standard/threading/the-managed-thread-pool.md)。To learn more about the thread pool, see [The Managed Thread Pool](~/docs/standard/threading/the-managed-thread-pool.md). > [!NOTE] > 您的應用程式不能混用特定要求的同步和非同步方法。Your application cannot mix synchronous and asynchronous methods for a particular request. 如果您呼叫方法，則必須使用方法，以擷取回應。If you call the method, you must use the method to retrieve the response. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用方法，讓資料流執行個體的非同步要求。The following code example uses the method to make an asynchronous request for a stream instance. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法開始非同步要求的回應來自網際網路資源。The method starts an asynchronous request for a response from the Internet resource. 非同步回呼方法會使用方法，以傳回實際。The asynchronous callback method uses the method to return the actual . A上設定屬性時擲回在有些情況下類別會互相衝突。A is thrown in several cases when the properties set on the class are conflicting. 如果應用程式設定，就會發生這個例外狀況屬性和屬性設`true`，然後將傳送 HTTP GET 要求。This exception occurs if an application sets the property and the property to `true`, and then sends an HTTP GET request. 如果應用程式嘗試以區塊傳送至伺服器，只支援 HTTP 1.0 通訊協定，其中不支援此功能，就會發生這個例外狀況。This exception occurs if an application tries to send chunked to a server that only supports HTTP 1.0 protocol, where this is not supported. 如果應用程式嘗試傳送資料，而不設定，就會發生這個例外狀況屬性或是`false`停用緩衝處理時，和 keepalive 連接上 (屬性是`true`)`.`This exception occurs if an application tries to send data without setting the property or the is `false` when buffering is disabled and on a keepalive connection (the property is `true`)`.` 如果會擲回，使用和要決定從伺服器回應的例外狀況的屬性。If a is thrown, use the and properties of the exception to determine the response from the server. 方法需要進行一些同步安裝程式工作，這個方法才會非同步完成 （DNS 解析、 proxy 偵測和 TCP 通訊端連線，例如）。The method requires some synchronous setup tasks to complete (DNS resolution, proxy detection, and TCP socket connection, for example) before this method becomes asynchronous. 如此一來，這個方法永遠不可叫用使用者介面 (UI) 執行緒上因為可能需要相當長的時間 （最多幾分鐘，視網路設定而定） 才能完成初始同步設定的例外狀況之前的錯誤會擲回或此方法成功。As a result, this method should never be called on a user interface (UI) thread because it might take considerable time (up to several minutes depending on network settings) to complete the initial synchronous setup tasks before an exception for an error is thrown or the method succeeds. 若要深入了解執行緒集區，請參閱[ [ \]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2be05b06-a42e-4c9d-a739-96c21d673927)。To learn more about the thread pool, see [[\]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2be05b06-a42e-4c9d-a739-96c21d673927). > retrieve the response. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ [ summary.span: 取得或設定要求的驗證資訊。

span.span: Gets or sets authentication information for the request.

value.span: ，包含與要求關聯的驗證認證。

span.span: An that contains the authentication credentials associated with the request.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含驗證資訊來識別要求的建立者。The property contains authentication information to identify the maker of the request. 屬性可以是、 在哪些情況下使用者、 密碼和網域中所包含的資訊物件用來驗證要求，或者它可以是，在此情況下統一的資源要求的識別碼 (URI) 用來判斷使用者、 密碼和網域資訊，用來驗證要求。The property can be either a , in which case the user, password, and domain information contained in the object is used to authenticate the request, or it can be a , in which case the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the request is used to determine the user, password, and domain information to use to authenticate the request. 在大部分的用戶端案例中，您應該使用屬性，其中包含目前登入使用者的認證。In most client scenarios, you should use the property, which contains the credentials of the currently logged on user. 若要這樣做，請設定屬性設`true`而不是設定這個屬性。To do this, set the property to `true` instead of setting this property. 如果類別用於中介層應用程式，例如 ASP.NET 應用程式中的認證屬性屬於執行 ASP 頁面 （伺服器端的認證） 的帳戶。If the class is being used in a middle-tier application, such as an ASP.NET application, the credentials in the property belong to the account running the ASP page (the server-side credentials). 一般而言，您會設定此屬性代表其提出要求的用戶端的認證。Typically, you would set this property to the credentials of the client on whose behalf the request is made. > [!NOTE] > NTLM 驗證配置，不能模擬其他使用者。The NTLM authentication scheme cannot be used to impersonate another user. Kerberos 必須經過特別設定為支援模擬。Kerberos must be specially configured to support impersonation. 若要限制 HttpWebRequest 一或多個驗證方法，使用類別，並將您的認證繫結至一個或多個驗證配置To restrict HttpWebRequest to one or more authentication methods, use the class and bind your credentials to one or more authentication schemes 支援的驗證配置包含摘要式、 交涉、 Kerberos、 NTLM 及 Basic。Supported authentication schemes include Digest, Negotiate, Kerberos, NTLM, and Basic. 基於安全性理由，會自動遵循重新導向時，儲存的認證，您想要包含在中的重新導向並將它指派給這個屬性。For security reasons, when automatically following redirects, store the credentials that you want to be included in the redirect in a and assign it to this property. 這個屬性會自動設定為`null`在重新導向，如果它包含以外的項目時。This property will automatically be set to `null` upon redirection if it contains anything except a . 具有這個屬性值自動設定為`null`在這些情況下不會將認證傳送至任何非預期的目的地。Having this property value be automatically set to `null` under those conditions prevents credentials from being sent to any unintended destination. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定要求的認證。The following code example sets the credentials for a request. [!code-cpp[NCLResponse1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLResponse1/CPP/httpwebrequest1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[NCLResponse1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLResponse1/CS/httpwebrequest1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[NCLResponse1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLResponse1/VB/httpwebrequest1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果日期標頭`null`，則傳回的值會設為。If the Date header is `null`, then the return value will be set to . 屬性是一種標準物件，並可包含欄位， ，或。The property is a standard object and can contain a field of , , or . 使用時，就可以設定任何一種時間屬性。Any kind of time can be set when using the property. 如果是設定或擷取屬性會假設為（本地時間）。If is set or retrieved, the property is assumed to be (local time). 中的類別命名空間永遠寫出使用 GMT (Utc) 格式的標準格式的傳輸期間在網路上的屬性。The classes in the namespace always write it out the property on the wire during transmission in standard form using GMT (Utc) format. 如果屬性設定為，則`Date`HTTP 標頭移除屬性而。If the property is set to , then the `Date` HTTP header is removed from the property and the . 如果屬性是，這表示`Date`HTTP 標頭不會納入屬性而。If the property is , this indicates that the `Date` HTTP header is not included in the property and the . > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性的值儲存在 中。The value for this property is stored in . 如果有設定 WebHeaderCollection，將會遺失屬性值。If WebHeaderCollection is set, the property value is lost. 如果設定和嘗試傳送沒有本文中，則會顯示將會擲回， ，和方法。If the is set and an attempt is made to send a with no body, then a will be thrown by the , , and methods.

summary.span: 取得或設定這個要求的預設快取原則。

span.span: Gets or sets the default cache policy for this request.

value.span: ，在沒有其他適用的原則時，為這個要求指定作用中的快取原則。

span.span: A that specifies the cache policy in effect for this request when no other policy is applicable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定這個屬性會註冊指定的原則，針對 HTTP 和 HTTPS 配置。Setting this property registers the specified policy for the HTTP and HTTPS schemes. 如果此要求會使用這項原則：This policy is used for this request if: 沒有任何針對這個要求指定的屬性。There is no property specified for this request. \-或-\- or - 電腦和應用程式組態檔沒有指定用來建立此要求的快取原則所適用的統一資源識別元 (URI)。The machine and application configuration files do not specify a cache policy that is applicable to the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) used to create this request. 快取原則會決定是否可以從快取，而非將要求傳送至資源的主機電腦獲得所要求的資源。The cache policy determines whether the requested resource can be taken from a cache instead of sending the request to the resource host computer. 如果資源的回應資料流擷取和讀取資料流末端，則一份資源只會加入至快取。A copy of a resource is only added to the cache if the response stream for the resource is retrieved and read to the end of the stream. 因此針對相同資源的另一個要求可以使用快取的複本，根據此要求的快取原則層級。So another request for the same resource could use a cached copy, depending on the cache policy level for this request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 回應狀態行及任何額外的控制字元收到的 HTTP 通訊協定的一部分，就會接收回應標頭的長度。The length of the response header received the response status line and any extra control characters that are received as part of HTTP protocol. 值為-1 表示沒有限制加諸於已接收的回應標頭值為 0 表示所有的要求會失敗。A value of -1 means no limit is imposed on the response headers received; a value of 0 means that all requests fail. 此值也可以變更組態檔中。This value can also be changed in the configuration file. 此屬性的影響，可以藉由設定覆寫的執行個體上的屬性類別。The impact of this property can be overridden by setting the property on an instance of the class.

exception.span: 值不等於 -1 且小於零。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法完成所啟動的資料流的非同步要求方法。The method completes an asynchronous request for a stream that was started by the method. 在後已傳回物件，您可以傳送資料使用方法。After the object has been returned, you can send data with the by using the method. > [!NOTE] > 您必須設定的值屬性，才能將資料寫入至資料流。You must set the value of the property before writing data to the stream. > [!CAUTION] > 您必須呼叫方法來關閉資料流並釋出以便重複使用的連線。You must call the method to close the stream and release the connection for reuse. 若要關閉資料流的失敗會造成您的應用程式沒有足夠的連線。Failure to close the stream causes your application to run out of connections. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用方法以結束資料流執行個體的非同步要求。The following code example uses the method to end an asynchronous request for a stream instance. [!code-cpp[HttpWebRequest_BeginGetRequestStream#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebRequest_BeginGetRequestStream/CPP/httpwebrequest_begingetrequeststream.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[HttpWebRequest_BeginGetRequestStream#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebRequest_BeginGetRequestStream/CS/httpwebrequest_begingetrequeststream.cs#2)] [!code-vb[HttpWebRequest_BeginGetRequestStream#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebRequest_BeginGetRequestStream/VB/httpwebrequest_begingetrequeststream.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法完成所啟動的資料流的非同步要求方法，並輸出資料流相關聯。The method completes an asynchronous request for a stream that was started by the method and outputs the associated with the stream. 在後已傳回物件，您可以傳送資料使用方法。After the object has been returned, you can send data with the by using the method. 使用擴充保護的整合式的 Windows 驗證的某些應用程式可能需要能夠查詢所使用的傳輸層以從基礎的 TLS 通道擷取通道繫結語彙基元 (CBT)。Some applications that use integrated Windows authentication with extended protection may need to be able to query the transport layer used by in order to retrieve the channel binding token (CBT) from the underlying TLS channel. 方法可以存取這項資訊的 HTTP 方法可以有要求本文 (`POST`和`PUT`要求)。The method provides access to this information for HTTP methods which have a request body (`POST` and `PUT` requests). 只有當時需要此應用程式實作自己的驗證，以及需要存取的 CBT。This is only needed if the application is implementing its own authentication and needs access to the CBT. > [!NOTE] > 如果應用程式需要的值設定屬性，則這必須擷取資料流，並對其寫入資料之前完成。If an application needs to set the value of the property, then this must be done before retrieving the stream and writing data to it. > [!CAUTION] > 您必須呼叫方法來關閉資料流並釋出以便重複使用的連線。You must call the method to close the stream and release the connection for reuse. 若要關閉資料流的失敗會造成您的應用程式沒有足夠的連線。Failure to close the stream causes your application to run out of connections. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回用來傳送資料資料流。The method returns a stream to use to send data for the . 在後已傳回物件，您可以傳送資料使用方法。After the object has been returned, you can send data with the by using the method. 如果應用程式需要的值設定屬性，則這必須完成之前擷取的資料流。If an application needs to set the value of the property, then this must be done before retrieving the stream. 您必須呼叫方法來關閉資料流並釋出以便重複使用的連線。You must call the method to close the stream and release the connection for reuse. 若要關閉資料流的失敗會造成您的應用程式沒有足夠的連線。Failure to close the stream causes your application to run out of connections. > [!NOTE] > 您的應用程式不能混用特定要求的同步和非同步方法。Your application cannot mix synchronous and asynchronous methods for a particular request. 如果您呼叫方法，則必須使用方法，以擷取回應。If you call the method, you must use the method to retrieve the response. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用方法來傳回資料流執行個體。The following code example uses the method to return a stream instance. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回用來傳送資料資料流，並將輸出資料流相關聯。The method returns a stream to use to send data for the and outputs the associated with the stream. 在後已傳回物件，您可以傳送資料使用方法。After the object has been returned, you can send data with the by using the method. 使用擴充保護的整合式的 Windows 驗證的某些應用程式可能需要能夠查詢所使用的傳輸層以從基礎的 TLS 通道擷取通道繫結語彙基元 (CBT)。Some applications that use integrated Windows authentication with extended protection may need to be able to query the transport layer used by in order to retrieve the channel binding token (CBT) from the underlying TLS channel. 方法可以存取這項資訊的 HTTP 方法可以有要求本文 (`POST`和`PUT`要求)。The method provides access to this information for HTTP methods which have a request body (`POST` and `PUT` requests). 只有當時需要此應用程式實作自己的驗證，以及需要存取的 CBT。This is only needed if the application is implementing its own authentication and needs access to the CBT. 如果應用程式需要的值設定屬性，則這必須完成之前擷取的資料流。If an application needs to set the value of the property, then this must be done before retrieving the stream. 您必須呼叫方法來關閉資料流並釋出以便重複使用的連線。You must call the method to close the stream and release the connection for reuse. 若要關閉資料流的失敗會造成您的應用程式沒有足夠的連線。Failure to close the stream causes your application to run out of connections. > [!NOTE] > 您的應用程式不能混用特定要求的同步和非同步方法。Your application cannot mix synchronous and asynchronous methods for a particular request. 如果您呼叫方法，則必須使用方法，以擷取回應。If you call the method, you must use the method to retrieve the response. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

summary.span: 傳回來自網際網路資源的回應。

returns.span: 包含來自網際網路資源回應的 。

span.span: A that contains the response from the Internet resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回物件，其中包含來自網際網路資源的回應。The method returns a object that contains the response from the Internet resource. 實際的執行個體傳回，和可以轉換型別為該類別來存取 HTTP 特定屬性。The actual instance returned is an , and can be typecast to that class to access HTTP-specific properties. A上設定屬性時擲回在有些情況下類別會互相衝突。A is thrown in several cases when the properties set on the class are conflicting. 如果應用程式設定，就會發生這個例外狀況屬性和屬性設`true`，然後將傳送 HTTP GET 要求。This exception occurs if an application sets the property and the property to `true`, and then sends an HTTP GET request. 如果應用程式嘗試以區塊傳送至伺服器，只支援 HTTP 1.0 通訊協定，其中不支援此功能，就會發生這個例外狀況。This exception occurs if an application tries to send chunked to a server that only supports HTTP 1.0 protocol, where this is not supported. 如果應用程式嘗試傳送資料，而不設定，就會發生這個例外狀況屬性或是`false`停用緩衝處理時，和 keepalive 連接上 (屬性是`true`)`.`This exception occurs if an application tries to send data without setting the property or the is `false` when buffering is disabled and on a keepalive connection (the property is `true`)`.` > [!CAUTION] > 您必須呼叫方法來關閉資料流並釋出連線。You must call the method to close the stream and release the connection. 若要這樣做可能導致您的應用程式沒有足夠的連線。Failure to do so may cause your application to run out of connections. 使用 POST 方法時，必須取得要求資料流，將資料寫入至張貼，並關閉資料流。When using the POST method, you must get the request stream, write the data to be posted, and close the stream. 此方法會封鎖等候要張貼; 的內容如果未逾時設定，而且您未提供內容，則呼叫端執行緒會封鎖無限期。This method blocks waiting for content to post; if there is no time-out set and you do not provide content, the calling thread blocks indefinitely. > [!NOTE] > 多次呼叫傳回相同的回應物件中; 要求不會重新發出。Multiple calls to return the same response object; the request is not reissued. > [!NOTE] > 您的應用程式不能混用特定要求的同步和非同步方法。Your application cannot mix synchronous and asynchronous methods for a particular request. 如果您呼叫方法，則必須使用方法，以擷取回應。If you call the method, you must use the method to retrieve the response. > [!NOTE] > 如果會擲回，使用和要決定從伺服器回應的例外狀況的屬性。If a is thrown, use the and properties of the exception to determine the response from the server. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). > [!NOTE] > 基於安全性理由，預設會停用 cookie。For security reasons, cookies are disabled by default. 如果您想要使用 cookie，使用屬性，來啟用 cookie。If you wish to use cookies, use the property to enable cookies. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會取得要求的回應。The following code example gets the response for a request. [!code-cpp[NCLResponse1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLResponse1/CPP/httpwebrequest1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[NCLResponse1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLResponse1/CS/httpwebrequest1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[NCLResponse1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLResponse1/VB/httpwebrequest1.vb#1)]

span.span: A that contains the name/value pairs that make up the headers for the HTTP request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合包含與要求相關聯的通訊協定標頭。The collection contains the protocol headers associated with the request. 下表列出不會儲存在 HTTP 標頭集合，而是由系統設定，或設定由屬性或方法。The following table lists the HTTP headers that are not stored in the collection but are either set by the system or set by properties or methods. |頁首Header|設定Set by| |------------|------------| |接受Accept|設定屬性。Set by the property.| |連線Connection|藉由設定屬性和屬性。Set by the property and property.| |內容長度Content-Length|設定屬性。Set by the property.| |Content-TypeContent-Type|設定屬性。Set by the property.| |預期Expect|設定屬性。Set by the property.| |日期Date|設定屬性。Set by the property.| |主機Host|設定屬性。Set by the property.| |如果修改自If-Modified-Since|設定屬性。Set by the property.| |範圍Range|設定方法。Set by the method.| |推薦者Referer|設定屬性。Set by the property.| |傳輸編碼方式Transfer-Encoding|藉由設定屬性 (屬性必須為 true)。Set by the property (the property must be true).| |使用者代理程式User-Agent|設定屬性。Set by the property.| 方法會擲回如果您嘗試設定其中一個受保護的標頭。The method throws an if you try to set one of these protected headers. 變更屬性，藉由呼叫要求啟動後， ， ，或方法會擲回。Changing the property after the request has been started by calling , , , or method throws an . 您不應該假設的標頭值會維持不變，因為 Web 伺服器和快取可能會變更或新增至 Web 要求的標頭。You should not assume that the header values will remain unchanged, because Web servers and caches may change or add headers to a Web request. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用列印至主控台的 HTTP 標頭名稱/值組的屬性。The following code example uses the property to print the HTTP header name/value pairs to the console. [!code-cpp[HttpWebRequest_Headers#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebRequest_Headers/CPP/httpwebrequest_headers.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[HttpWebRequest_Headers#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebRequest_Headers/CS/httpwebrequest_headers.cs#1)] [!code-vb[HttpWebRequest_Headers#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebRequest_Headers/VB/httpwebrequest_headers.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定 Host 標頭值，此標頭可用於獨立於要求 URI 的 HTTP 要求中。

span.span: Get or set the Host header value to use in an HTTP request independent from the request URI.

value.span: HTTP 要求中的 Host 標頭值。

span.span: The Host header value in the HTTP request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可以用來設定主應用程式獨立於要求 URI 的 HTTP 要求中所使用的標頭值。The property can be used to set the Host header value to use in an HTTP request independent from the request URI. 屬性可包含主機名稱和選擇性的連接埠號碼。The property can consist of a hostname and an optional port number. 不含連接埠資訊的主機標頭表示要求的服務 （連接埠 80 的 HTTP URL，例如） 的預設連接埠。A Host header without port information implies the default port for the service requested (port 80 for an HTTP URL, for example). 用於主機和連接埠指定的格式必須遵循 IETF 發行的 RFC2616 14.23 區段中的規則。The format for specifying a host and port must follow the rules in section 14.23 of RFC2616 published by the IETF. 指定連接埠 8080 的範例符合這些需求會是下列值屬性：An example complying with these requirements that specifies a port of 8080 would be the following value for the property: `www.contoso.com:8080` 使用快取的區域、 cookie 和驗證，也會影響屬性來明確指定自訂的主機標頭值。Using the property to explicitly specify a custom Host header value also affects areas caching, cookies, and authentication. 當應用程式特定的 URI 前置詞提供的認證時，應用程式必須確定使用的 URI 包含主機標頭，而不是在 URI 中的目標伺服器的值。When an application provides credentials for a specific URI prefix, the applications needs to make sure to use the URI containing the value of the Host header, not the target server in the URI. 主機標頭值，而不是在要求 URI，則會使用快取資源時所用的索引鍵。The key used when caching resources, uses the Host header value rather than the request URI. Cookie 會儲存在及伺服器的網域名稱以邏輯方式分組。Cookies are stored in a and logically grouped by the server domain name. 如果應用程式指定主機標頭，則會使用此值作為網域。If the application specifies a Host header, then this value will be used as domain. 如果未設定屬性，則在 HTTP 要求中使用的主機標頭值根據在要求 URI。If the property is not set, then the Host header value to use in an HTTP request is based on the request URI.

span.span: The Host header cannot be set to .

span.span: The Host header cannot be set to an invalid value.

exception.span: 啟動待傳送之後，不能設定主機標頭。

span.span: The Host header cannot be set after the has already started to be sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在特定用戶端提出要求後成功驗證時，如果是`true`並提供認證，授權標頭會隨著每個要求傳送至任何符合特定到最後的斜線。After a client request to a specific is successfully authenticated, if is `true` and credentials are supplied, the Authorization header is sent with each request to any that matches the specific up to the last forward slash. 因此，如果用戶端要求已成功驗證特定包含下列：So if the client request successfully authenticated to a specific that contains the following: `http://www.contoso.com/firstpath/` 然後進行預先驗證的授權標頭與每個要求傳送至下列任一項執行個體：Then the Authorization header for preauthentication is sent with each request to any of the following instances: `http://www.contoso.com/firstpath/` `http://www.contoso.com/firstpath/default` `http://www.contoso.com/firstpath/default.html` `http://www.contoso.com/firstpath/sample.html` 不過，授權標頭不會傳送要求到下列任一項執行個體：However, the Authorization header is not sent with requests to any of the following instances: `http://www.contoso.com/` `http://www.contoso.com/firstpath` `http://www.contoso.com/secondpath/` 如果用戶端要求在特定是驗證不成功，要求會使用標準驗證程序。If the client request to a specific is not successfully authenticated, the request uses standard authentication procedures. 第一個要求中，除了屬性會指出是否要傳送的後續要求使用的驗證資訊符合特定到而不需要等待進行最後的斜線伺服器所面臨的挑戰。With the exception of the first request, the property indicates whether to send authentication information with subsequent requests to a that matches the specific up to the last forward slash without waiting to be challenged by the server. 用戶端與伺服器之間的下列對話方塊說明這個屬性的效果。The following dialog between client and server illustrates the effect of this property. 對話方塊會假設該基本驗證是使用中。The dialog assumes that basic authentication is in use. 是`false`: is `false`: 用戶端： GET someUrlClient: GET someUrl 伺服器： 401 Www-authenticate BasicServer: 401 WWW-Authenticate Basic 取得使用授權標頭的用戶端：Client: GET with Authorization headers 伺服器： 200 確定Server: 200 OK 用戶端： GET someUrlClient: GET someUrl 伺服器： 401 Www-authenticate BasicServer: 401 WWW-Authenticate Basic 取得使用授權標頭的用戶端：Client: GET with Authorization headers 伺服器： 200 確定Server: 200 OK 是`true`: is `true`: 用戶端： GET someUrlClient: GET someUrl 伺服器： 401 Www-authenticate BasicServer: 401 WWW-Authenticate Basic 取得使用授權標頭的用戶端：Client: GET with Authorization headers 伺服器： 200 確定Server: 200 OK 用戶端： 取得使用授權標頭 someUrlClient: GET someUrl with Authorization headers 如果不支援預先驗證的驗證配置，則會忽略這個屬性的值。If the authentication scheme does not support preauthentication, the value of this property is ignored.

summary.span: 取得或設定要求的 Proxy 資訊。

span.span: Gets or sets proxy information for the request.

value.span: 呼叫 屬性可以設定預設值。

span.span: The default value is set by calling the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會識別物件，用來處理對網際網路資源的要求。The property identifies the object to use to process requests to Internet resources. 若要指定任何 proxy，應使用，請設定屬性所傳回的 proxy 執行個體方法。To specify that no proxy should be used, set the property to the proxy instance returned by the method. 在本機電腦或應用程式組態檔，可能會指定使用預設 proxy。The local computer or application config file may specify that a default proxy be used. 如果指定屬性，然後從的 proxy 設定屬性會覆寫本機電腦或應用程式組態檔和執行個體將會使用指定的 proxy 設定。If the property is specified, then the proxy settings from the property override the local computer or application config file and the instance will use the proxy settings specified. 如果未不指定任何 proxy 在組態檔中，屬性未指定，類別會使用繼承自 Internet Explorer 中，在本機電腦上的 proxy 設定。If no proxy is specified in a config file and the property is unspecified, the class uses the proxy settings inherited from Internet Explorer on the local computer. 如果沒有在 Internet Explorer proxy 設定，要求會直接傳送到伺服器。If there are no proxy settings in Internet Explorer, the request is sent directly to the server. 類別剖析包含萬用字元的 proxy 略過清單繼承自 Internet Explorer 相同略過清單是由 Internet Explorer 直接剖析。The class parses a proxy bypass list with wildcard characters inherited from Internet Explorer the same as the bypass list is parsed directly by Internet Explorer. 例如，類別將會剖析"nt *"從 Internet Explorer 略過清單做為規則運算式的 「 nt。\*"。For example, the class will parse a bypass list of "nt*" from Internet Explorer as a regular expression of "nt.\*". 因此的 URL 」`http://nt.com`」 會略過 proxy 使用類別和使用 Internet Explorer。So a URL of "`http://nt.com`" would bypass the proxy using the class and using Internet Explorer. 類別支援本機 proxy 略過。The class supports local proxy bypass. 類別會將目的地為本機，如果下列任一條件成立：The class considers a destination to be local if any of the following conditions are met: - 目的地包含一般名稱 （不在 URL 中的點）。The destination contains a flat name (no dots in the URL). - 目的地包含迴路位址 (或是) 或目的地包含指派給本機電腦。The destination contains a loopback address ( or ) or the destination contains an assigned to the local computer. - 目的地的網域尾碼符合本機電腦的網域尾碼 ()。The domain suffix of the destination matches the local computer's domain suffix (). 變更屬性，藉由呼叫要求啟動後， ， ，或方法會擲回。Changing the property after the request has been started by calling the , , , or method throws an . 如需 proxy 項目，請參閱[ \&l t; defaultProxy\>項目 （網路設定）](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/defaultproxy-element-network-settings.md)。For information on the proxy element see [\<defaultProxy\> Element (Network Settings)](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/defaultproxy-element-network-settings.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用方法來取得要求的 proxy 資訊。The following code example uses the method to get the proxy information for the request. [!code-cpp[Httpwebrequest_proxy#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Httpwebrequest_proxy/CPP/httpwebrequest_proxy.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Httpwebrequest_proxy#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Httpwebrequest_proxy/CS/httpwebrequest_proxy.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Httpwebrequest_proxy#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Httpwebrequest_proxy/VB/httpwebrequest_proxy.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會提出後續的同步要求的毫秒數方法會等候回應，而; 方法等候資料流。 is the number of milliseconds that a subsequent synchronous request made with the method waits for a response, and the method waits for a stream. 整個要求和回應，適用於個別為不和方法呼叫。The applies to the entire request and response, not individually to the and method calls. 如果資源不會傳回逾時期限內，要求會擲回具有屬性設定為。If the resource is not returned within the time-out period, the request throws a with the property set to . 必須設定屬性，才或呼叫方法。The property must be set before the or method is called. 變更屬性之後呼叫或方法沒有任何作用Changing the property after calling the or method has no effect 屬性具有非同步使用提出的要求不會影響或方法。The property has no effect on asynchronous requests made with the or method. > [!CAUTION] > 如果是非同步的要求，用戶端應用程式會實作其本身的逾時機制。In the case of asynchronous requests, the client application implements its own time-out mechanism. 中的範例，請參閱方法。Refer to the example in the method. 若要指定的時間等候讀取或寫入作業逾時，使用屬性。To specify the amount of time to wait before a read or write operation times out, use the property. 網域名稱系統 (DNS) 查詢可能需要最多 15 秒鐘傳回或逾時。如果您的要求包含需要解析的主機名稱，而且您設定的值小於 15 秒，可能需要 15 秒以上之前就會擲回以指出您的要求逾時。A Domain Name System (DNS) query may take up to 15 seconds to return or time out. If your request contains a host name that requires resolution and you set to a value less than 15 seconds, it may take 15 seconds or more before a is thrown to indicate a timeout on your request. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定屬性物件。The following code example sets the property of the object. summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否允許高速 NTLM 驗證連接共用。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to allow high-speed NTLM-authenticated connection sharing.

value.span: 保持已驗證連接於開啟的狀態，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: to keep the authenticated connection open; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的預設值是`false`，因而導致要求完成之後關閉目前的連接。The default value for this property is `false`, which causes the current connection to be closed after a request is completed. 您的應用程式必須通過驗證的順序，每一次，就會發出新的要求。Your application must go through the authentication sequence every time it issues a new request. 如果這個屬性設定為`true`，執行驗證之後，用來擷取回應的連線保持開啟。If this property is set to `true`, the connection used to retrieve the response remains open after the authentication has been performed. 在此情況下，其他要求，將此屬性設定為`true`可能使用的連接，而不需重新驗證。In this case, other requests that have this property set to `true` may use the connection without re-authenticating. 換句話說，如果使用者 A 已驗證的連線，使用者 B 可以重複使用 A 的連線;使用者 B 的要求完成根據使用者 a 的認證In other words, if a connection has been authenticated for user A, user B may reuse A's connection; user B's request is fulfilled based on the credentials of user A. > [!CAUTION] > 因為它可能會有應用程式使用的連接，而不必經過驗證，您必須要確定沒有任何系統管理的弱點可能會在您的系統時將此屬性設定為`true`。Because it is possible for an application to use the connection without being authenticated, you need to be sure that there is no administrative vulnerability in your system when setting this property to `true`. 如果您的應用程式會將要求傳送多個使用者 （會模擬多個使用者帳戶），並需要驗證來保護資源，執行未設定這個屬性為`true`除非您使用連線群組，如下所述。If your application sends requests for multiple users (impersonates multiple user accounts) and relies on authentication to protect resources, do not set this property to `true` unless you use connection groups as described below. 您可能要考慮啟用這項機制，如果您有效能問題，並使用整合式 Windows 驗證的 Web 伺服器上執行您的應用程式。You may want to consider enabling this mechanism if your are having performance problems and your application is running on a Web server with integrated Windows authentication. 啟用此設定會使系統的安全性風險。Enabling this setting opens the system to security risks. 如果您設定屬性設`true`務必採取下列預防措施：If you set the property to `true` be sure to take the following precautions: - 使用屬性來管理不同使用者的連線。Use the property to manage connections for different users. 這會避免潛在的連線使用未經驗證的應用程式。This avoids the potential use of the connection by non-authenticated applications. 例如，使用者 A 應該有唯一的連線群組名稱，不同於使用者 b。這會提供每個使用者帳戶的隔離層。For example, user A should have a unique connection group name that is different from user B. This provides a layer of isolation for each user account. - 執行您的應用程式中受保護的環境，可協助避免可能的連接入侵。Run your application in a protected environment to help avoid possible connection exploits. 如果您控制後端伺服器，或者您可以考慮關閉驗證持續性。If you control the back-end server, as an alternative you might consider turning off authentication persistence. 這會增加效能，以較小的程度，但是比較安全。This increases performance to a lesser degree, but it is safer. 如需詳細資訊，搜尋 MSDN library 中的 AuthPersistence [ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library)。For more details, search for AuthPersistence in the MSDN library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library). > [!NOTE] > 如果兩個並設定為`true`，每個要求會傳送來自不安全的集區，但具有授權標頭使用的連接。If both and are set to `true`, each request is sent using a connection from the unsafe pool, but with an Authorization header.
